Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 42nd overall pick, by Coney Island in 1977...
Traded from Coney Island to Gashouse on 2/24/1977 (Going to GHG: LF R. Cobble. Going to CI: P J. Pepper)...
Injured on 7/11/1977 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/9/1982 with a Fractured Nose, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/21/1986 with a Bruised Heel, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 9/3/1987, off Lyman Mcmillan (Ash)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/10/1988, off Alvin Keough (BC)...
Injured on 5/28/1988 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Gashouse to Plum Grove on 7/31/1988 (Going to PG: LF R. Cobble. Going to GHG: CF J. Balas, P J. Morello)...
Injured on 5/7/1990 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
